sent.orig: Did you tell your boyfriend about your ex-boyfriend?
sent.trans: 你有没有跟你（现在的）男朋友讲你以前男朋友的事？

sent.orig: She has a boyfriend. Unfortunately, most drop-dead gorgeous girls I meet already have a boyfriend.
sent.trans: 她已经有男朋友了！Larry,你动作太慢了！

sent.orig: I don't have a boyfriend. I've never had a boyfriend.
sent.trans: 我没有男友，我从来没有男友。

sent.orig: But lately she's been tight-lipped about her boyfriend Jack.
sent.trans: 近来她在她男朋友杰克的问题上却守口如瓶。

sent.orig: Jack is Mary' s boyfriend -- Mary is Jack' s girlfriend.
sent.trans: 杰克是玛丽的男朋友，玛丽是杰克的女朋友。
